item.title: Japan’s approach to aging, debt-ridden decline is no model for the U.S.
item.description: America urgently needs entitlement reform and economic growth, not Japanese-style debt risk.

item.title: An innovative approach to expanding health coverage is gaining steam
item.description: A portable benefits program is the solution that meets the moment.

item.title: Attempts to demonize the Taj Mahal damage more than history
item.description: The storied monument has become a flash point in India’s Hindu-Muslim conflict.

item.title: This slap in the face to rural America is a chance to turn it blue
item.description: Democrats should be the party of aspiration — and talk like normal human beings.

item.title: The mass deportation campaign is already backfiring
item.description: Approval for Trump’s immigration approach slipped following over-the-top raids in sanctuary cities.

item.title: Walking in D.C. is ‘maddening and frightening’
item.description: Readers respond to Post articles and commentary.

item.title: The signs of educational decline are now impossible to ignore
item.description: UC San Diego report shows students are not prepared for college, especially in math.

item.title: With great presidential power comes great presidential blame
item.description: Trump has devised the most powerful executive branch of modern times. Now he owns whatever goes wrong.

item.title: It’s time to end the filibuster
item.description: Senate Republicans should not shy from doing what Democrats are certain to do.

item.title: Privatize air traffic control
item.description: Safely directing thousands of commercial flights every day is too important to be left to politics.

item.title: Zelensky may never have faced a more agonizing choice
item.description: U.S. officials tell me Trump’s peace plan is flexible, but a painful decision lies at its core.

item.title: Ukraine needs Russia’s frozen $200 billion immediately, Europe
item.description: With Trump seeking Kyiv’s capitulation to Russia, now is the moment for decisive European action.
